name: Sakimi-chan LoRA
description:
Sakimi-chan LoRA

Who is Sakimi-chan?

Sakimi-chan is a Canadian artist best known for her digital paintings and unique style. She mainly draws fanart of games and popular characters and creates gifs for her fans with voiceovers. Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/sakimichan

Use Cases

The LoRA is in itself very compatible with the most diverse model. However, it is most effective when used with Kenshi or AbyssOrangeMix2.

The LoRA itself was trained with the token: skistyle. I would suggest using the token with AbyssOrangeMix2, but not with Kenshi, since I got better results that way.

The model mentioned right now

  1. AbyssOrangeMix2 from WarriorMama777

  2. Kenshi Model from Luna

Strength

I would personally use these strength with the assosiated model:

  • 0.8-0.85 for AbyssOrangeMix2

  • 0.65-0.75 for Kenshi
